content.question: Which of the following hypotheses would most likely be evaluated by an industrial-organizational psychologist?

choices.label: Improved lighting conditions will lead to increased worker productivity and reduced errors in the workplace.
Personal daily gratitude practices will lead to increased levels of happiness and life satisfaction.
A new therapeutic drug will have a significant positive effect on reducing symptoms of depression in patients.
Group identification will influence an individualâ€™s attitudes and behaviors toward out-group members at sports events.

content.answer: Improved lighting conditions will lead to increased worker productivity and reduced errors in the workplace.

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
